item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded: <script type=spa/axn axn=core.run_script modules='common-js'></script> <script type=spa/axn axn=core.run_script libs='react_demo'></script> [aw2.module slug="{qs.0}" /]

item.title: home
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded:
[css.style] main[role='react-home']{ .navbar{ background: transparent; } .navbar-bg{ background: #1ab4ee; } .list-block .pending{ opacity: 0.30; pointer-events: none; } } [/css.style]
arrow_back
[aw2.get module.navtitle default="React Demo" /]
//**
loop
**//
[aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="f7" icon="filter_7" title="Compatibility with Framework 7" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="form-fields" icon="description" title="Form Fields" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="file-upload" icon="cloud_upload" title="File Upload" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="file-download" icon="cloud_download" title="file Download" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="no-internet" icon="wifi_off" title="No internet" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="gps" icon="gps_fixed" title="GPS Coordinates" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="rn-function" icon="android" title="RN Functions" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="login-with-google" icon="login" title="Login with Google" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="backbutton-action" icon="favorite_border" title="Backbutton Action" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="working" icon="tv" title="splash screen" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="firebase-analytics-integration" icon="poll" title="Firebase analytics Integration" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="push-notification" icon="notifications_active" title="Push notification" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="facebook-sdk" icon="facebook" title="Facebook SDK" status="Done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="payu-integration" icon="payment" title="Payu Integration" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="prevent-screenshot" icon="cancel_presentation" title="Prevent Screenshot" status="Done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="record-audio-video" icon="record_voice_over" title="Record audio/video" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="device-info" icon="record_voice_over" title="Device Info" status="done" /] [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="ext-link" icon="record_voice_over" title="External Linking" status="done" /] //** [aw2.set_array template.lists.new module="record-audio-video" icon="videocam" title="Record Video" status="pending" /]**//

item.title: f7
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded:
[css.style] main[role='react-f7']{ .navbar{ background: transparent; } .navbar-bg{ background: #1ab4ee; } .swiper-wrapper{ height: calc(~"100% - 150px"); top: 101px; z-index: 20; } .swiper-container { height: 100%; } .swiper-slide { background:#fff; } .swiper-slide span { text-align:center; display:block; margin:20px; font-size:21px; } } [/css.style]
arrow_back
Framework7 slider
Slide 1
Slide 2
Slide 3
Slide 4

item.title: common-js
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded:
<script type="spa/axn" axn=core.run_script>
      spa.react_demo={};
      spa.react_demo.prerequisites={};

      spa.react_demo.prerequisites.js_files='';

      spa.react_demo.init=function(){}

      spa.react_demo.slider=function(){
         // 1 Slide Per View, 10px Between
          var myApp = new Framework7(); 
          
          // Init slider and store its instance in mySwiper variable
          var mySwiper = myApp.swiper('.swiper-container', {
            pagination:'.swiper-pagination'
          });
  	}
     
	</script>

item.title: file-upload
item.dc:creator: dev
item.content:encoded:
[templates.add main]
[css.style] main[role='[module.get slug /]']{ .navbar{ background: transparent; } .navbar-bg{ background: #1ab4ee; } } [/css.style]
arrow_back
File Upload
[session_ticket.create nonce=yes set=template.ticket_id/] [session_ticket.set_activity {template.ticket_id} app=m_reactdemo module='file-upload.upload_file' /]
[/templates.add] [templates.add upload_file] [aw2.upload attach_to_post post_id="1" upload_element_id="img" allowed_file_types="gif,png,jpg,jpeg,svg,pdf,xlsx" set="module.attach_id" /] [php.wp_get_attachment_url p1="{{aw2.get module.attach_id}}" set="module.attach_url" /] [/templates.add]
